ViewObject.Name: FcsModifierAreaView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT DENSE_RANK () OVER (ORDER BY lala.no_confirm, lala.promo_produk_id, lala.break_type, lala.product_value, lala.ket) AS line_num, DENSE_RANK () OVER (ORDER BY lala.promo_produk_id) AS product_id, LALA."NO_CONFIRM", LALA."CURRENCY", LALA."START_DATE", LALA."END_DATE", LALA."ACTIVE", LALA."AUTOMATIC", LALA."LINE_LEVEL", LALA."LINE_TYPE", LALA."START_DATE_LINE", LALA."END_DATE_LINE", LALA."AUTOMATIC_LINE", LALA."PRICING_PHASE", LALA."BUCKET", LALA."PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE", LALA."PRODUCT_VALUE", LALA."VOLUME_TYPE", LALA."BREAK_TYPE", LALA."UOM", LALA."VALUE_FROM", LALA."VALUE_TO", LALA."APPLICATION_METHOD", LALA."VALUE", LALA."GROUPING_NO", LALA."QUALIFIER_CONTEXT", LALA."QUALIFIER_ATTR", LALA."OPERATOR_SIGN", LALA."VALUE_QUALIFIER", LALA."CUSTOMER_TYPE_KET", LALA."CUSTOMER_TYPE", LALA."CUSTOMER_GROUP_KET", LALA."CUSTOMER_GROUP", LALA."CUSTOMER_KET", LALA."CUSTOMER", LALA."CONFIRM_NO_DEF", LALA."PROMO_PRODUK_ID", LALA."DISC_YEARLY", LALA."KET", LALA."KELIPATAN", LALA."PAKET_FLAG", LALA."PROD_FLG", LALA."MUL_FLG" FROM ( -- MF QUERY SELECT DISTINCT (CASE WHEN PROP.ADDENDUM_KE IS NULL THEN PROP.CONFIRM_NO ELSE PROP.CONFIRM_NO || '-' || PROP.ADDENDUM_KE END) AS NO_CONFIRM, PROP.CURRENCY, PROP.PERIODE_PROG_FROM AS START_DATE, PROP.PERIODE_PROG_TO AS END_DATE, 'Y' AS ACTIVE, 'Y' AS AUTOMATIC, (CASE WHEN PROP.MIX_QTY_PROMO = 'N' THEN 'LINE' ELSE 'LINEGROUP' END) AS LINE_LEVEL, 'Discount' AS LINE_TYPE, PROP.PERIODE_PROG_FROM AS START_DATE_LINE, PROP.PERIODE_PROG_TO AS END_DATE_LINE, 'Y' AS AUTOMATIC_LINE, 'All Lines Adjustment' AS PRICING_PHASE, PROD.KODE_POSTING_MF AS BUCKET, (CASE WHEN PROD_VARIANT.VARIANT_DESC = 'ALL' AND PROD_ITEM IS NOT NULL THEN PROD_ITEM.PROD_ITEM ELSE ( PROD.PRODUCT_CATEGORY || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_CLASS || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_BRAND || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_EXT || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_PACK || '.' || PROD_VARIANT ) END ) AS PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE, (CASE WHEN PROD_VARIANT.VARIANT_DESC = 'ALL' AND PROD_ITEM IS NOT NULL THEN PROD_ITEM.PROD_ITEM ELSE ( PROD.PRODUCT_CATEGORY || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_CLASS || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_BRAND || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_EXT || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_PACK || '.' || PROD_VARIANT ) END ) AS PRODUCT_VALUE, 'Item Quantity' AS VOLUME_TYPE, (CASE WHEN (DISC.TIPE_PERHITUNGAN = 'TDKKELIPATAN') THEN 'Point' ELSE 'Recurring' END ) AS BREAK_TYPE, DISC.UOM AS UOM, DISC.QTY_FROM AS VALUE_FROM, NVL (DISC.QTY_TO, 999999) AS VALUE_TO, DISC.TIPE_POTONGAN AS APPLICATION_METHOD, (CASE WHEN PROP.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' AND PROP.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' THEN DISC.DISC_YEARLY ELSE PROD.DISC_MF END ) AS VALUE, -1 AS GROUPING_NO, 'Customer' AS QUALIFIER_CONTEXT, '=' AS OPERATOR_SIGN, (CASE WHEN PCH.CUST_REG_FLG = 'REGION' THEN 'FCS_REGION' WHEN PCH.CUST_REG_FLG = 'AREA' THEN 'FCS_AREA' WHEN PCH.CUST_REG_FLG = 'LOCATION' THEN 'FCS_LOCATION' ELSE 'NOT DEFINED' END ) AS QUALIFIER_ATTR, REGION.VALUE AS VALUE_QUALIFIER, CUST_TYPE.KET CUSTOMER_TYPE_KET, CUST_TYPE.VALUE CUSTOMER_TYPE, CUST_GROUP.KET CUSTOMER_GROUP_KET, CUST_GROUP.VALUE CUSTOMER_GROUP, CUST.KET CUSTOMER_KET, CUST.VALUE CUSTOMER, PROP.CONFIRM_NO AS CONFIRM_NO_DEF, PROD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PROD.DISC_MF AS DISC_YEARLY, 'MF' KET, DISC.KELIPATAN, PROD.PAKET_FLAG, (CASE WHEN PROD_VARIANT.VARIANT_DESC = 'ALL' AND PROD_ITEM IS NOT NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'C' END) AS PROD_FLG, (CASE WHEN PROP.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' AND PROP.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' THEN CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(MDSC.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) FROM DISCOUNT MDSC WHERE MDSC.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PROD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) > 1 THEN 'M' ELSE 'S' END ELSE NULL END ) AS MUL_FLG FROM PROPOSAL PROP, PROMO_PRODUK PROD, DISCOUNT DISC, PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA PCH, ( SELECT REG.PROPOSAL_ID, REG.REGION_CODE VALUE, REG.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID, 'REGION' KET FROM PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA REG WHERE REG.REGION_CODE IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT AREA.PROPOSAL_ID, AREA.AREA_CODE VALUE, AREA.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID, 'AREA' KET FROM PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA AREA WHERE AREA.AREA_CODE IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT LOC.PROPOSAL_ID, LOC.LOC_CODE VALUE, LOC.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID, 'LOCATION' KET FROM PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA LOC WHERE LOC.LOC_CODE IS NOT NULL ) REGION, PRODUK_VARIANT PROD_VARIANT, PRODUK_ITEM PROD_ITEM, ( SELECT DISTINCT AC.ATTRIBUTE3 REGION, AC.ATTRIBUTE4 AREA, AC.ATTRIBUTE5 LOC, TYP.PROPOSAL_ID, TYP.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID, TYP.CUSTTYP_DESC NOTES, TYP.CUSTTYP_CODE VALUE, 'FCS_CUST_TYPE' KET FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS AC, PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA TYP WHERE AC.ATTRIBUTE8 = TYP.CUSTTYP_CODE ) CUST_TYPE, ( SELECT DISTINCT AC.ATTRIBUTE3 REGION, AC.ATTRIBUTE4 AREA, AC.ATTRIBUTE5 LOC, AC.ATTRIBUTE8 TYPECUST, CGROUP.PROPOSAL_ID, CGROUP.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID, CGROUP.CUSTGRP_DESC NOTES, CGROUP.CUSTGRP_CODE VALUE, 'FCS_CUST_GROUP' KET FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS AC, PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA CGROUP WHERE AC.ATTRIBUTE1 = CGROUP.CUSTGRP_CODE ) CUST_GROUP, ( SELECT DISTINCT AC.ATTRIBUTE3 REGION, AC.ATTRIBUTE4 AREA, AC.ATTRIBUTE5 LOC, AC.ATTRIBUTE8 TYPECUST, AC.ATTRIBUTE1 GROUPCUST, CUST.PROPOSAL_ID, CUST.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID, CUST.CUSTOMER_NAME NOTES, CUST.CUSTOMER_ID VALUE, 'SOLD_TO_ORG_ID' KET FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS AC, PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA CUST WHERE AC.CUSTOMER_ID = CUST.CUSTOMER_ID ) CUST WHERE PROP.CONFIRM_NO IS NOT NULL AND PROD.PROPOSAL_ID = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID AND DISC.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PROD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PCH.PROPOSAL_ID = PROD.PROPOSAL_ID AND PCH.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID = REGION.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID AND REGION.KET = PCH.CUST_REG_FLG -- TYPE AND REGION.VALUE = NVL(DECODE(REGION.KET,'REGION',CUST_TYPE.REGION,'AREA',CUST_TYPE.AREA,'LOCATION',CUST_TYPE.LOC),REGION.VALUE) -- AND CUST_TYPE.PROPOSAL_ID(+) = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID AND PCH.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID = CUST_TYPE.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID(+) -- GROUP AND REGION.VALUE = NVL(DECODE(REGION.KET,'REGION',CUST_GROUP.REGION,'AREA',CUST_GROUP.AREA,'LOCATION',CUST_GROUP.LOC),REGION.VALUE) -- AND CUST_GROUP.PROPOSAL_ID(+) = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID AND PCH.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID = CUST_GROUP.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID(+) AND CASE WHEN CUST_GROUP.TYPECUST IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_GROUP.TYPECUST WHEN CUST_GROUP.TYPECUST IS NULL AND CUST_TYPE.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE ELSE 'KOSONG' END = CASE WHEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE WHEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE IS NULL AND CUST_GROUP.TYPECUST IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_GROUP.TYPECUST ELSE 'KOSONG' END -- CUST AND REGION.VALUE = NVL(DECODE(REGION.KET,'REGION',CUST.REGION,'AREA',CUST.AREA,'LOCATION',CUST.LOC),REGION.VALUE) -- AND CUST.PROPOSAL_ID(+) = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID AND PCH.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID = CUST.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID(+) AND CASE WHEN CUST.TYPECUST IS NOT NULL THEN CUST.TYPECUST WHEN CUST.TYPECUST IS NULL AND CUST_TYPE.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE ELSE 'KOSONG' END = CASE WHEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE WHEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE IS NULL AND CUST.TYPECUST IS NOT NULL THEN CUST.TYPECUST ELSE 'KOSONG' END AND CASE WHEN CUST.GROUPCUST IS NOT NULL THEN CUST.GROUPCUST WHEN CUST.GROUPCUST IS NULL AND CUST_GROUP.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_GROUP.VALUE ELSE 'KOSONG' END = CASE WHEN CUST_GROUP.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_GROUP.VALUE WHEN CUST_GROUP.VALUE IS NULL AND CUST.GROUPCUST IS NOT NULL THEN CUST.GROUPCUST ELSE 'KOSONG' END -- AND PROD_VARIANT.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PROD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PROD_ITEM.PROMO_PRODUK_ID(+) = PROD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PROP.USER_TYPE_CREATOR = 'AREA' AND PROD.PRODUCT_APPROVAL = 'Y' AND DISC.DISC_YEARLY <> 0 AND PROP.CONFIRM_NO = :noConfirm AND nvl(PROP.ADDENDUM_KE,0) = nvl((SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(ADDENDUM_KE)) FROM PROPOSAL WHERE CONFIRM_NO = :noConfirm),0) UNION ALL -- OT QUERY SELECT DISTINCT (CASE WHEN PROP.ADDENDUM_KE IS NULL THEN PROP.CONFIRM_NO ELSE PROP.CONFIRM_NO || '-' || PROP.ADDENDUM_KE END) AS NO_CONFIRM, PROP.CURRENCY, PROP.PERIODE_PROG_FROM AS START_DATE, PROP.PERIODE_PROG_TO AS END_DATE, 'Y' AS ACTIVE, 'Y' AS AUTOMATIC, (CASE WHEN PROP.MIX_QTY_PROMO = 'N' THEN 'LINE' ELSE 'LINEGROUP' END) AS LINE_LEVEL, 'Discount' AS LINE_TYPE, PROP.PERIODE_PROG_FROM AS START_DATE_LINE, PROP.PERIODE_PROG_TO AS END_DATE_LINE, 'Y' AS AUTOMATIC_LINE, 'All Lines Adjustment' AS PRICING_PHASE, PROD.KODE_POSTING AS BUCKET, (CASE WHEN PROD_VARIANT.VARIANT_DESC = 'ALL' AND PROD_ITEM IS NOT NULL THEN PROD_ITEM.PROD_ITEM ELSE ( PROD.PRODUCT_CATEGORY || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_CLASS || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_BRAND || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_EXT || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_PACK || '.' || PROD_VARIANT ) END ) AS PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE, (CASE WHEN PROD_VARIANT.VARIANT_DESC = 'ALL' AND PROD_ITEM IS NOT NULL THEN PROD_ITEM.PROD_ITEM ELSE ( PROD.PRODUCT_CATEGORY || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_CLASS || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_BRAND || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_EXT || '.' || PROD.PRODUCT_PACK || '.' || PROD_VARIANT ) END ) AS PRODUCT_VALUE, 'Item Quantity' AS VOLUME_TYPE, (CASE WHEN (DISC.TIPE_PERHITUNGAN = 'TDKKELIPATAN') THEN 'Point' ELSE 'Recurring' END ) AS BREAK_TYPE, DISC.UOM AS UOM, DISC.QTY_FROM AS VALUE_FROM, NVL (DISC.QTY_TO, 999999) AS VALUE_TO, DISC.TIPE_POTONGAN AS APPLICATION_METHOD, (CASE WHEN PROP.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' AND PROP.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' THEN DISC.DISC_NON_YEARLY ELSE PROD.DISC_ON_TOP END ) AS VALUE, -1 AS GROUPING_NO, 'Customer' AS QUALIFIER_CONTEXT, '=' AS OPERATOR_SIGN, (CASE WHEN PCH.CUST_REG_FLG = 'REGION' THEN 'FCS_REGION' WHEN PCH.CUST_REG_FLG = 'AREA' THEN 'FCS_AREA' WHEN PCH.CUST_REG_FLG = 'LOCATION' THEN 'FCS_LOCATION' ELSE 'NOT DEFINED' END ) AS QUALIFIER_ATTR, REGION.VALUE AS VALUE_QUALIFIER, CUST_TYPE.KET CUSTOMER_TYPE_KET, CUST_TYPE.VALUE CUSTOMER_TYPE, CUST_GROUP.KET CUSTOMER_GROUP_KET, CUST_GROUP.VALUE CUSTOMER_GROUP, CUST.KET CUSTOMER_KET, CUST.VALUE CUSTOMER, PROP.CONFIRM_NO AS CONFIRM_NO_DEF, PROD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PROD.DISC_ON_TOP AS DISC_NON_YEARLY, 'OT' KET, DISC.KELIPATAN, PROD.PAKET_FLAG, (CASE WHEN PROD_VARIANT.VARIANT_DESC = 'ALL' AND PROD_ITEM IS NOT NULL THEN 'I' ELSE 'C' END) AS PROD_FLG, (CASE WHEN PROP.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' AND PROP.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' THEN CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(MDSC.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) FROM DISCOUNT MDSC WHERE MDSC.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PROD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) > 1 THEN 'M' ELSE 'S' END ELSE NULL END ) AS MUL_FLG FROM PROPOSAL PROP, PROMO_PRODUK PROD, DISCOUNT DISC, PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA PCH, ( SELECT REG.PROPOSAL_ID, REG.REGION_CODE VALUE, REG.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID, 'REGION' KET FROM PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA REG WHERE REG.REGION_CODE IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT AREA.PROPOSAL_ID, AREA.AREA_CODE VALUE, AREA.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID, 'AREA' KET FROM PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA AREA WHERE AREA.AREA_CODE IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT LOC.PROPOSAL_ID, LOC.LOC_CODE VALUE, LOC.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID, 'LOCATION' KET FROM PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA LOC WHERE LOC.LOC_CODE IS NOT NULL ) REGION, PRODUK_VARIANT PROD_VARIANT, PRODUK_ITEM PROD_ITEM, ( SELECT DISTINCT AC.ATTRIBUTE3 REGION, AC.ATTRIBUTE4 AREA, AC.ATTRIBUTE5 LOC, TYP.PROPOSAL_ID, TYP.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID, TYP.CUSTTYP_DESC NOTES, TYP.CUSTTYP_CODE VALUE, 'FCS_CUST_TYPE' KET FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS AC, PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA TYP WHERE AC.ATTRIBUTE8 = TYP.CUSTTYP_CODE ) CUST_TYPE, ( SELECT DISTINCT AC.ATTRIBUTE3 REGION, AC.ATTRIBUTE4 AREA, AC.ATTRIBUTE5 LOC, AC.ATTRIBUTE8 TYPECUST, CGROUP.PROPOSAL_ID, CGROUP.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID, CGROUP.CUSTGRP_DESC NOTES, CGROUP.CUSTGRP_CODE VALUE, 'FCS_CUST_GROUP' KET FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS AC, PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA CGROUP WHERE AC.ATTRIBUTE1 = CGROUP.CUSTGRP_CODE ) CUST_GROUP, ( SELECT DISTINCT AC.ATTRIBUTE3 REGION, AC.ATTRIBUTE4 AREA, AC.ATTRIBUTE5 LOC, AC.ATTRIBUTE8 TYPECUST, AC.ATTRIBUTE1 GROUPCUST, CUST.PROPOSAL_ID, CUST.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID, CUST.CUSTOMER_NAME NOTES, CUST.CUSTOMER_ID VALUE, 'SOLD_TO_ORG_ID' KET FROM APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS AC, PROMO_CUSTOMER_AREA CUST WHERE AC.CUSTOMER_ID = CUST.CUSTOMER_ID ) CUST WHERE PROP.CONFIRM_NO IS NOT NULL AND PROD.PROPOSAL_ID = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID AND DISC.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PROD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PCH.PROPOSAL_ID = PROD.PROPOSAL_ID AND PCH.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID = REGION.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID AND REGION.KET = PCH.CUST_REG_FLG -- TYPE AND REGION.VALUE = NVL(DECODE(REGION.KET,'REGION',CUST_TYPE.REGION,'AREA',CUST_TYPE.AREA,'LOCATION',CUST_TYPE.LOC),REGION.VALUE) -- AND CUST_TYPE.PROPOSAL_ID(+) = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID AND PCH.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID = CUST_TYPE.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID(+) -- GROUP AND REGION.VALUE = NVL(DECODE(REGION.KET,'REGION',CUST_GROUP.REGION,'AREA',CUST_GROUP.AREA,'LOCATION',CUST_GROUP.LOC),REGION.VALUE) -- AND CUST_GROUP.PROPOSAL_ID(+) = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID AND PCH.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID = CUST_GROUP.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID(+) AND CASE WHEN CUST_GROUP.TYPECUST IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_GROUP.TYPECUST WHEN CUST_GROUP.TYPECUST IS NULL AND CUST_TYPE.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE ELSE 'KOSONG' END = CASE WHEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE WHEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE IS NULL AND CUST_GROUP.TYPECUST IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_GROUP.TYPECUST ELSE 'KOSONG' END -- CUST AND REGION.VALUE = NVL(DECODE(REGION.KET,'REGION',CUST.REGION,'AREA',CUST.AREA,'LOCATION',CUST.LOC),REGION.VALUE) -- AND CUST.PROPOSAL_ID(+) = PROP.PROPOSAL_ID AND PCH.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID = CUST.PROMO_CUSTOMER_ID(+) AND CASE WHEN CUST.TYPECUST IS NOT NULL THEN CUST.TYPECUST WHEN CUST.TYPECUST IS NULL AND CUST_TYPE.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE ELSE 'KOSONG' END = CASE WHEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE WHEN CUST_TYPE.VALUE IS NULL AND CUST.TYPECUST IS NOT NULL THEN CUST.TYPECUST ELSE 'KOSONG' END AND CASE WHEN CUST.GROUPCUST IS NOT NULL THEN CUST.GROUPCUST WHEN CUST.GROUPCUST IS NULL AND CUST_GROUP.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_GROUP.VALUE ELSE 'KOSONG' END = CASE WHEN CUST_GROUP.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN CUST_GROUP.VALUE WHEN CUST_GROUP.VALUE IS NULL AND CUST.GROUPCUST IS NOT NULL THEN CUST.GROUPCUST ELSE 'KOSONG' END -- AND PROD_VARIANT.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PROD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PROD_ITEM.PROMO_PRODUK_ID(+) = PROD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PROP.USER_TYPE_CREATOR = 'AREA' AND PROD.PRODUCT_APPROVAL = 'Y' AND DISC.DISC_NON_YEARLY <> 0 AND PROP.CONFIRM_NO = :noConfirm AND nvl(PROP.ADDENDUM_KE,0) = nvl((SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(ADDENDUM_KE)) FROM PROPOSAL WHERE CONFIRM_NO = :noConfirm),0) ) LALA ORDER BY PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PRODUCT_ID, LINE_NUM ASC
